document.full_text: russian human rights activists appealed to president dmitry medvedev on wednesday to intervene to stop extrajudicial kidnappings and enforce the rule of law in the country's predominantly muslim region of chechnya.
document.title: groups urge medvedev: bring rule of law to chechnya
lines_and_colors: russian human rights activists appealed to president dmitry medvedev on wednesday to intervene to stop extrajudicial kidnappings and enforce the rule of law in the country's predominantly muslim region of chechnya.
